EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Reactor for asynch/non-blocking microservices.Reminder 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Today's Webinar: Using Reactor for asych/non-blocking microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for the webinar Using Reactor for asych/non-blocking microservices. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e29dfffc0ff1a7c64a301f295eb7abaae> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 664 962 446 Thank you,
